txt.en: Hard Tack Event: Special Brew
Deliver the Thorin's Hall Brew to a brew table
Deliver the brew to a brew table
Complete the brew in the oven and deliver it to the table

'Ho there! The grand chefs of Thorin's Hall intend on making enough hard tack to feed an expedition.

'To speed their efforts, prospectors will supply ever-burning ore from here in the depths to the furnace firing the ovens above. We cooks down here have an important role.

'We make brew, snacks, and a meal that helps everyone here in the depths perform better, faster, stronger! If you are willing to help out, we will see you rewarded well!'
Collect an ale ingredient from the nearby keg
Place the Thorin's Hall brew on a brew table
Collect a mushroom ingredient from the mushroom crate
Hard Tack at Thorin's Hall has ended
Collect spice from the spice rack
Collect a spice ingredient from the spice rack
A sneaky hobbit spilled your brew
<rgb=#ff0000>Avoid sneaky hobbits</rgb>
Collected ale from the brew keg
A brew that gives a burst of focus and energy is a necessity in times like these. Try your hand at delivering this brew.
Collected a mushroom ingredient
Craft the Thorin's Brew beverage, then deliver it to a brew table to help all the workers perform at their peak.
<rgb=#ff0000>Hard Tack at Thorin's Hall ends</rgb>
Collect the ingredients needed to craft the Thorin's Hall Brew from the nearby mushrooms, keg, and spice rack.
